actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the meat import law in order to impose the limitation thereunder if the estimated quantity of imported meat will equal or exceed 100 percent, rather than 110 percent, of the quota for any year.

summary.text: Revises the formula for imposition of the meat importation quota to impose such limitations when the meat imports for a calendar quarter are estimated to exceed the quota amounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the meat import law in order to impose the limitation thereunder if the estimated quantity of imported meat will equal or exceed 100 percent, rather than 110 percent, of the quota for any year.
